# rtx_syslog (Resource)

Manages syslog configuration on RTX routers. This is a singleton resource - only one instance can exist per router.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `host` (Block Set, Min: 1) Syslog destination hosts (one or more) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--host))

### Optional

- `debug` (Boolean) Enable debug level logging
- `facility` (String) Syslog facility (user, local0-local7)
- `info` (Boolean) Enable info level logging
- `local_address` (String) Source IP address for syslog messages
- `notice` (Boolean) Enable notice level logging

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.

<a id="nestedblock--host"></a>
### Nested Schema for `host`

Required:

- `address` (String) IP address or hostname of the syslog server

Optional:

- `port` (Number) UDP port (default 514, use 0 to use default)
